title: Shujaa finish third at Nairobi Sevens after losing to USA

title: World Hippo Day 2026: The race to save river giants
desc: World Hippo Day 2026 highlights conservation needs for Africa's vulnerable river giants facing habitat loss.

title: Africa: 'Relooted' - the Video Game Where Players Steal Back African Artefacts
desc: A video game released this week by a South African company features characters from the African continent whose objective is to reclaim artefacts looted by colonisers from Western museums and bring them home - a playful take on a timely political topic.

title: Kenya Power Announces Areas to Experience Electricity Interruptions on Monday, February 16
desc: Kenya Power schedules maintenance on Feb 16, cutting electricity for up to 8 hours in Nairobi, Kajiado, and Kericho counties. Find areas affected and timings.

title: Mikaela Shiffrin upbeat despite finishing 11th in giant slalom at 2026 Winter Olympics: It went 'better' than expected
desc: The double Olympic champion was happy with her skiing and is looking ahead to the slalom, her last chance to win a medal: “I think today was a really great practice for a strong, flexible mentality, which is what I want to feel in the coming days as well,” she said.

title: Beijing drops visa requirement for Canadian tourists, business visitors to China
desc: China is dropping its visa requirement for Canadian tourists and business visitors, after moves by Prime Minister Mark Carney to put relations with Beijing on a better footing.
